00023 
00024 #include <l4/sys/l4int.h>
00025 
00026 typedef struct l4re_event_stream_id_t
00027 {
00028   l4_uint16_t bustype;
00029   l4_uint16_t vendor;
00030   l4_uint16_t product;
00031   l4_uint16_t version;
00032 } l4re_event_stream_id_t;
00033 
00034 typedef struct l4re_event_absinfo_t
00035 {
00036   l4_int32_t value;
00037   l4_int32_t min;
00038   l4_int32_t max;
00039   l4_int32_t fuzz;
00040   l4_int32_t flat;
00041   l4_int32_t resolution;
00042 } l4re_event_absinfo_t;
00043 
00044 enum l4re_event_stream_max_values_t
00045 {
00046   L4RE_EVENT_EV_MAX  = 0x1f,
00047   L4RE_EVENT_KEY_MAX = 0x1ff,
00048   L4RE_EVENT_REL_MAX = 0xf,
00049   L4RE_EVENT_ABS_MAX = 0x3f,
00050 };
00051 
00052 enum l4re_event_stream_props_t
00053 {
00054   L4RE_EVENT_STREAM_CALIBRATE = 0x001,
00055 };
00056 
00057 
00058 #define __UNUM_B(x) (x + sizeof(unsigned long)*8 - 1) / (sizeof(unsigned long)*8)
00059 
00060 typedef struct l4re_event_stream_info_t
00061 {
00062   l4_umword_t stream_id;
00063   char name[32];
00064   char phys[32];
00065   l4re_event_stream_id_t id;
00066 
00067   unsigned long props;
00068 
00069   unsigned long evbits[__UNUM_B(L4RE_EVENT_EV_MAX)];
00070   unsigned long keybits[__UNUM_B(L4RE_EVENT_KEY_MAX)];
00071   unsigned long relbits[__UNUM_B(L4RE_EVENT_REL_MAX)];
00072   unsigned long absbits[__UNUM_B(L4RE_EVENT_ABS_MAX)];
00073 
00074 } l4re_event_stream_info_t;
00075 
00076 #undef __UNUM_B
